website_summaries.verdict: Most buyers felt this was a durable kit that worked well, although some felt that a few of the pieces were of lower quality.
pros: Pieces include a watch band link remover, jewelers hammer, and set of mini-screwdrivers
This kit is able to open watch cases up to a diameter of 37mm
cons: Some reports of this kit arriving with broken tools
Some buyers felt that some of the tools here – notably the tweezers – are of lower quality and don't work well

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for beginners and everyone trying to get into ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for beginners and everyone trying to get into DIY watch repair! Bodi hut, has the absolute best customer service! I had a part of the watch hammer break and I asked them how I could do about just a replacement hammer and they said don't worry about it, we'll send you a new kit. Don't worry about sending the old one back, we don't want to inconvenience you in any way. Great product, great customer service and a quick response. Needless to say i'd highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: OMG I was so surprised at the quality of theses tools, who would of thought that there could be so much thought into putting this kit together, I no longer have to hunt around fo a punch, small screw driver, it's all right there in the kit. I used some of the screw drivers to tighten som screws on the arms of my glasses, that's like multi purpose tooling right there. I am very pleased with my purchase. And I will pass on the good name
customer_reviews.author: Robert Holland

customer_reviews.title: BEST KIT EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a repair kit to change out batteries on her numerous watches. Each watch is a little different and without the right tools is difficult to do. This kit literally has "everything" you need for any job you needed to do. We were amazed at the product and quality for the price! I highly recommend "THIS" kit over the others. I researched the different ones and thus was the best and the price was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rodger

customer_reviews.title: I've only had the kit a few days now, ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the kit a few days now, but have already used it several times to replace bands on my Gear S3 that either do not have spring bar pins with the bands or to resize watch bands that were too big. In both cases, the tools that came with the kit worked perfectly! Solid construction and so far all the tools are in the kit that I've needed. I can't speak to the longevity of the product at this point, but not being a watch repair pro, this is set that any DIY'er can use and to repair watches at home.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Tavy

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: After watching a u-tube video on how to adjust or remove links, I used it today to remove four links from the band that came with my new watch. Even removed the new replacement band that a jeweler installed to replace the original band but was still much too long and I reinstalled the original one after removing the necessary links. Spent less for this kit than I paid the jeweler to change the original band which I ended up putting back on after removing the extra links. Will keep this around for future adjustments or battery replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. J

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: You received a lot of tools for the price which was great. My watch, however, is one where the backing simply pops off, but the tool that is used for that purpose, the red handled scalpel looking tool's edge was not thin enough to fit underneath the gap to pop it off. So I sadly had to return it. The booklet was super great and handy. The pictures were super helpful and really interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good Kit For Simple Repairs
customer_reviews.text: I got this at a pretty low price and it is great. It has all kinds of useful tools that I've never had before and I've used them to take apart watch bands with no problem. You can easily open up any watch with what's included. I still have some bracelets that I can't take apart but maybe I just need to learn how. This is a good kit for simple watch stuff for sure
customer_reviews.author: J. Mclean

customer_reviews.title: What a bummer, the instruction book was not included in the package
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this awhile ago, I just got around to using it today. I have several watches in need of battery changes and pin repair, but darn it low and behold, the instruction book was not included/missing from the package. This was extremely disappointing since I do not know how to use all of the gadgets contained in this kit. That and the instruction book was the main reason that I purchased this particular kit.
customer_reviews.author: diheart

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: Returning. The pliers are improperly made and not usable, the tweezers are also poorly made and do not meet as they should, and the case knife is so thick on the edge as to be useless. The rest of the tools aren't well made either - didn't even try to use them as they looked too fragile. I didn't expect much for the price, but I did at least expect everything to be usable. The booklet was nice. I would buy the booklet by itself if it was available.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Everything in the kit seemed to be new and of decent quality especially for the price. The case is great to have to keep everything together. My issue is with the needle nose pliers. They are in awful condition and appear to be a factory default, see pictures. One side is rounded over with no teeth and the other isn't much better. I have several needle-nose pliers from my other tools I can use but if you don't make sure to check everything in the kit carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Mostly alright
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift, so I can't attest to its durability or functionality. The tools were all out of place when I received this- no big deal, I just put them back in wherever I thought they went. The rubber on the pliers is dirty and damaged though. Thankfully it's for my husband who won't care, otherwise I'd be really disappointed to give this to someone with it already looking used.
customer_reviews.author: fb21

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the item I most needed from this set.
customer_reviews.text: The knife-like item used to remove the back of the case is the main thing I needed from this set. Unfortunately it is so thick it won't open the watch case that I needed open. So I am disappointed. I am hoping to be able to sharpen this tool so I can get the blade under the edge of the watch case to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Becks

customer_reviews.title: the parts are garbage. I've been able to open the backs of ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just to replace batteries on my watches. Thought it would sufficient to do that however, the parts are garbage. I've been able to open the backs of my watches with mini screwdrivers but nothing in this kit was able to open any of them. Worthless for simple job! Too bad I didn't find out sooner as now I can't even return it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality !! Stay away!! Link remover came broken already.
customer_reviews.author: D. Crutchfield

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit that Works
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. Purchased mainly for watch battery replacements and (along with a watch press for snapping cases back in to place), this works perfectly. I've often wondered if I received new batteries from jewelery stores when I paid for battery replacements since the batteries rarely lasted - now I'll find out. Thanks for a great kit.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tweezer
customer_reviews.text: The lit is pretty nice. However, the tweezers are terrible! You cannot grasp tiny screws at all! If you Plan on getting this, do not rely on the tweezers for use.
customer_reviews.author: RICK ZEITLIN

customer_reviews.title: Good budget general watch toolkit.
customer_reviews.text: Good budget general watch toolkit. Everything is inexpensive but it gives you a good variety for basic watch repair or customization needs. If you need to work on watches more often, then invest in higher quality dedicated tools for which type of work it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this product if you wear watches a lot of the time!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have many watches, and I hadn't worn them in years - too lazy and cheap to pay for watch repair and a new battery installation. I bought this hit and BAM: Mo Money Mo Watches! This watch repair kit has everything I needed to get all 30 of my watches working again! The manual helped me understand the purpose of each tool! In no time I felt like an expert . And now I fix my buddies watches! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great watch repair kit for the DIY!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this watch repair kit 5 stars for the functionality of the tools, not the quality...but lets be real for the cost you cant expect to get professional watch/jeweler quality tools! Bottom line if you're a DIY person, then this kit is for you. I found the best tools in this kit are the watch band block, hammer, punches, and battery case removing tool...overall the tools functioned well enough to complete the job in 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My son got this because he had several watches that needed to have links removed and batteries changed. Jewelers were going to charge him $13 per watch for link removals and $15 for battery replacement per watch. Even if he never uses this again, it was totally worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Lover

customer_reviews.title: Watch battery replacement made easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit. I've replaced the batteries in several watches with ease. It would be great if it had a tool to help put the backs back on the watches, but a great kit all the same.
customer_reviews.author: playfulbeards

customer_reviews.title: This kit is brilliant! I have two Michael Kors watches that were ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit is brilliant! I have two Michael Kors watches that were both in need of a battery change. Dillards no longer changes batteries, so I thought I'd order this and do it myself. Honestly, it was so easy that I think I missed my calling.
customer_reviews.author: CzechNovots

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This kit seems to be good quality, and provides all the tools needed to adjust pin style watch bands. Also all the tools needed to change battery. It was really nice that the kit came with a instruction manual. Being a amateur I found this Manuel very useful.
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopper 1

customer_reviews.title: Saved me Money
customer_reviews.text: I have already saved money from buying this and I really like it. I have only one watch that didn't want to work with me using this, but it finally worked out. I hope I can buy part to it. It's very nice and you will save money with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rino

customer_reviews.title: I really do love this. The instructions (via adobe attach) are simple ...
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this. The instructions (via adobe attach) are simple to follow. I collect watches and I like to keep them working and looking good. I love to change bands to give it a new look. I want to learn more and they have given me an opportunity to do just that. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Leona Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Essential tools at a good price. Excellent booklet
customer_reviews.text: A very useful collection of basic tools for the amateur watch repair enthusiast. The explanatory and instructional booklet that comes with it is alone worth the price of the kit. It is essential information for the beginning horologist and very well done.
customer_reviews.author: Donaldo42

customer_reviews.title: Not all parts are well made.
customer_reviews.text: The watch band link pin remover broke the first time I tried to use it. When I turned the handle, plastic pieces broke off and it no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Jack J. Forrest

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive product that works great. I bought this because it was less than having the battery replaced and the watch band resized after a pregnancy. I was able to do both repairs quickly and easily. If you want precision professional tools, you will have to pay for them. If you are looking to do simple repairs, this works well. The customer service is courteous and prompt. The warranty is also nice. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: ALD

customer_reviews.title: Watch too loose? Too tight?
customer_reviews.text: I've resized two watch bands and it's already paid for itself. Much more than most watch owner's need. Hell it's more than what most watch enthusiasts need but it's nice to have the tools in case you need them. Would buy it again. Spay and neuter your pets.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard E Robinson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for DIY-level watch repairs.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product for DIY-level watch repairs. You're probably not going to use this in your Cartier-authorized repair business, but in one week I've resuscitated 2 watches (one with 30+ years of hard use) using this kit. As with any hobby, in time you will find additional or alternative tools to build out your toolbox, but so far I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Most of it works well.
customer_reviews.text: Device to remove snap watch case doesn’t work well, hammer doesn’t reattach. Other tools work OK. Need to get a press as well if you want to get the cover back on easily.
customer_reviews.author: amateur photographer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit,informative
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, so far replaced a lot of batteries and watch bands. Has a helpful manual and very helpful seller email with instructions. Concerned that I was completely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool set
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool set. I didn't think I needed to buy this tool set,but I'm sure glad I did. I had family members asking my to adjust their watch bands. Having the right tools is half the battle. So glad I purchased this set. I would recommend this to keep around. Thank you for your product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cuffney

customer_reviews.title: Has everything to repair watches
customer_reviews.text: This was the best tool kit for repairing watches. Has everything you would possibly need. Usually there is one or two tools you never seem to have, but this Watch Repair Kit has it all
customer_reviews.author: Linnea C Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he likes to work on his watches. I have to say it helped him a lot! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: works well for me , good tools!
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and the video to show you how to use most tools are very helpful, for and watch lover!! overall nice product!! thanks Bodi Hut and Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: rocketred

customer_reviews.title: easy handling watch repair tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery of this well constructed, easy handling watch repair tool kit. Tools are solidly constructed and well fitting for the detailed work required. As a new hobbiest, these tools meet and exceeded my expectations. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch Repair Kit!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this Kit. The Tools look very sturdy. I read through the manual just after opening. Everything you need right in the case to repair common watch problems. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sodmtngranny1

customer_reviews.title: Handy Watch Kit
customer_reviews.text: Tools came in a zippered case. Great for keeping everything organized and in its place. I especially liked the detailed instructional book that was emailed to me right after I placed the order. I have received emails from the company to support me in the use of the kit. It seems to be a very caring company with a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: PJK

customer_reviews.title: but it worked great.
customer_reviews.text: So excited to be able to take links out of my watches on my own. It worked very well. I have only used it once so far, but it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: SVC

customer_reviews.title: Only other thing I would recommend is a press to reattach the back cover on ...
customer_reviews.text: This compact assortment of tools has just about everything you will need to do At-Home watch repair/maintenance. Only other thing I would recommend is a press to reattach the back cover on watches that are press on vs screw on.
customer_reviews.author: S_Henley

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once but totally worth it. I like being hands on and fixing things myself, so yes this is the kind kits make me happy.
customer_reviews.author: septimus

customer_reviews.title: It' very useful
customer_reviews.text: I never realized how many watches I have that needed batteries until I purchased this kit. It has everything I need to maintain my watches. It is a little hard to know what everything is for but I'm learning as i go - that may just be me, as I am not very handy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Paddy

customer_reviews.title: Product Evaluation
customer_reviews.text: The product has met my expectations and is in accordance with the published announcement. I recommend to all Amazon.com members
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Roberto Mattos Paiva

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have item if you are a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have item if you are a watch collector. The watch repair store charges $7 to adjust the metal bands for my wrist. For the price of 2 adjustments I can now do it myself at home. Kit had everything needed to make the adjustments. The instructions were clear as well.
customer_reviews.author: MrWGT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: After paying $45 to have my $5 watch battery replaced on my Fossil watch after only a year, I decided I needed to try to do it myself. I decided to give this kit a try. I read the instructions and in less than 10 minutes changed the battery myself. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Neil

customer_reviews.title: It is very difficult, if not impossible, to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult, if not impossible, to open most of the watches. I have tried it on 5 different kinds of watches and it never worked for me. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered fast and has a nice case. Everything included as advertised as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this product yet but will be shortly. Delivered fast and has a nice case. Everything included as advertised as well as the 100 day warrenty and pdf instructions. Now I just need to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Watch Repair
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, did not have the tool I need the most - the press for putting the back of the watch on.
customer_reviews.author: P. Moore

customer_reviews.title: you better already know which tool is for what and how ...
customer_reviews.text: While the package seems to have a lot of tools, there are no instructions for any of them. so if you are going to order this, you better already know which tool is for what and how to use it. (I searched YouTube as well for instructions on this specific product but didn't find them.)
customer_reviews.author: Mukee57

customer_reviews.title: Cheap kind
customer_reviews.text: I got this tool thinking it was a great deal but actually not because one plastic base broke and the other item is no use because its not thin enough to open my watch.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic repair set
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic repair set. This set has tools to fix any watch. Pays for itself if you replace just 1 battery compared to what a jeweler would charge you. The instructions are easy to follow which makes it fun for people like myself that enjoys learning new things.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Dankanich

customer_reviews.title: Channel the inner jeweler in you
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tools for minor watch repair. Great for glasses too.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and was able to repair a few watches for myself and family. Delivered when said would be - thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But all the tools are well made and it comes in a nice carrying case
customer_reviews.text: the only thing I have to say why I gave it a 4 star is because they never sent me my instructions on how to use all the tools in my watch repair kit. But all the tools are well made and it comes in a nice carrying case .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Used it to change straps and batteries. Handbook is very helpful. I highly recommend this product

customer_reviews.title: Received set and everything looks good but it never came with instructions nor in the ...

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit of Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit! Good quality. Made it very easy to remove excess links from several watches.

customer_reviews.title: Professional tools at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift it seems to be just what they wanted. Pro tools at a great price. Includes Full Step By Step Instructions, Strong Tool Case, Free Microfibre Cleaning Towel

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: The tools barely fit inside. It seems like all of the sellers get these from the same factory and no one has bothered to make a really good kit. It is getting the job done, but it's definitely a cheap tool set.

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like cheap plastic. Not impressed at first. Has worked perfectly every time--now I kick myself for not buying it sooner

customer_reviews.title: Every tool you need!
customer_reviews.text: I used to work in a watch Dept in a major store. this kit has everything you could need and more!

customer_reviews.title: I bought this so I could replace my watch battery ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could replace my watch battery. It has a sealed back so it's difficult to remove. The tools are cheap(but they work.) The instructions were helpful.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works o k for most watches, tools are poorly made.

customer_reviews.title: I thoroughly enjoy the Bodi Hut watch repair kit
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly enjoy the Bodi Hut watch repair kit, I have already saved money by changing the batteries in my watches, and several watch bands. Much better than burning gas going to the mall. Ron
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely happy with the quality services
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with the quality services, and this kit was very affordable and came one week faster than expected. I am from the land down under Australia and love the services that Amazon provides. I bought this for my friend and it will save us lots of time and money to adjust our watches and be able to install new batteries.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't beleive how much you get for such a low price! I trade/collect watches and this is invaluable.

customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has a watch collection. So I bought him this tool kit. He immediately used it haha It's affordable and it has many little tools needed for any watch.

customer_reviews.text: I have found this tool set to be extremely useful for a wide variety of watch styles! It’s a great deal!

customer_reviews.text: its is an excellent product. easy to use. I just took off 2 links from my new watch belt. I just saved 10 bucks, feels so good.
customer_reviews.author: Siree

customer_reviews.title: Already Paid for Itself
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit so I could save on the cost of getting two new watches properly sized for my wrist. I am not an expert at watches and didn't realize that my watches each had a different type of pin. One was the kind that I could push through and pop out, but the other was a screw type of pin. This kit worked well for each type. The cost of this kit was less than I expected to pay to have a jeweler or watch shop do the work for me on a single watch.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: GREAT KIT FOR THE D.I.Y. GUY !
customer_reviews.text: GREAT KIT. Has everything you need to get the backs off. GREAT for band adjustment also. I would buy again! I recommend you buy this if you need to change a battery!
customer_reviews.author: Billy T. aka, Oob Ooberton

customer_reviews.title: Easy watch repair kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit includes EVERYTHING you need to repair your watch at home. Video shows what to do. Save money and DIY. PRICED RIGHT too
customer_reviews.author: The 4 ziggys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best tool kit for watch repair and the manual is really useful

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this repair kit. Very user friendly and the instruction booklet is spot on.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great tool bargain for the price
customer_reviews.text: This set came with everything I needed including the instructions to change the battery on one watch, and adjust the links on another. Excellent bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bman

customer_reviews.title: Great for my watch collector
customer_reviews.text: Was bought as a gift he was very happy with it

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tools to start
customer_reviews.text: I am learning a new job in watch repair. Great set of tools to start, I am sure I will need more later. Can not wait to learn about solar watch...Have some fun.
customer_reviews.author: andres

product_meta.title: Bodi Hut Watch Repair Tool Kit with Strong Storage Case, Microfibre Cleaning Towel and Full Step By Step Instructions (16 pieces)
product_meta.description: PREMIUM QUALITY - STRONG AND LONG LASTING – Change batteries and mend and adjust your treasured timepieces - saving you time and money. Plus, every purchase is backed with a 100 DAY WARRANTY.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY - STRONG AND LONG LASTING – Change batteries and mend and adjust your treasured timepieces - saving you time and money. Plus, every purchase is backed with a 100 DAY WARRANTY.
UNSURE HOW TO USE ALL 16 PIECES? We supply you with FULL WRITTEN INSTRUCTIONS AND IMAGES giving you guidance every step of the way, from the watchback remover to link replacement.
FITS ALL WATCHCASES UP TO A DIAMETER OF 37mm making this compatible with the majority of standard size cases.
WHAT COMES IN THE SET? We guarantee you’ll have every standard industry item required to make battery changes, mend faults, alter bracelet lengths – whatever the problem, you’ll be able to solve it!
SCREWDRIVERS AND PINS ARE VARIED IN SIZE AND TYPE – allowing you to work on multiple sizes and brands – perfect whether you’re an avid collector or simply want to help friends and family out as well!
